name: A Long Night's Work
description:
The attackers come in waves now. At first it was a few opportunistic attacks on the coolant factory. Now the attacks seem vindictive. The defensive turrets are down. Radar & comms are out. All that's left to protect us is a Mouse class Agro-Mech, and you're the only pilot. One pilot, one mech, and a long night's work ahead of us...

Kill each wave of mechs, collect the scrap metal and upgrade your own mech and base defenses to survive the night..

A Long Night's Work was created for Mech Jam II https://itch.io/jam/mechjam2

Controls

Turn - A,D or Left Arrow, Right Arrow or NumPad4, NumPad 6

Walk - W,S, Up Arrow, Down Arrow, or NumPad8, NumPad 2

Aim - Mouse

Fire/Attack - Mouse Button 2

Change Weapon - Mouse Scroll Wheel

Use Coolant - C, Enter or NumPad Enter

Select Right Arm Weapon - 1

Select Left Arm Weapon - 2

Select Right Shoulder Weapon - 3

Select Left Shoulder Weapon - 4

Pause - Escape

Credits

Title Font - https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Bungee+Hairline

Base/Environment Models, Mini Square font,  SoundFX, along with some UI and Particle assets from https://www.kenney.nl/ free assets.
